5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas bin Malik said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘A man’s prayer in his house is equal (in reward) to one prayer; his prayer in the mosque of the tribes is equal to twenty-five prayers; his prayer in the mosque in which Friday prayer is offered is equal to five-hundred prayers; his prayer in Aqsa Mosque is equal to fifty thousand prayers; his prayer in my mosque is equal to fifty thousand prayers; and his prayer in the Sacred Mosque is equal to one hundred thousand prayers.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الصَّلاَةِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ الْجَامِعِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning Prayer in the Jami’ Masjid
